course_description: Explore the fundamentals of causality. You will be introduced to 2 commonly used approaches to studying causality: Directed Acyclic Graph approach and Potential Outcome approach. Each module will expose you to a particular method and three components: intuition, formalization, and application.
prerequisites: QTM 220 or ECON 320 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
schedule_location: MW 10am-11:15am in Math & Science Center - N304
